body_content.explanation: able to bend a little without breaking:
examples: The razor has a semi-flexible blade that works with the contours of the face for a smooth shave.
A semiflexible wire with an inflatable balloon on the tip is inserted into the nostril.

body_content.explanation: able to change or be changed, but not completely:
examples: My schedule is semi-flexible - I have meetings in the morning but am free for coffee anytime in the afternoon.
Some of the demands are semi-flexible, and the other side is willing to negotiate with us on a deal.
